questions.question: At what age should women begin routine mammogram screening for breast cancer?
questions.expected_conflict: Training data cutoff varies - 2024 USPSTF lowered to 40, older models say 50
questions.authority_answer: Age 40 (2024 USPSTF recommendation)
questions.trap_answer: Age 50 (outdated 2009-2016 recommendation)

questions.question: Should men get routine PSA screening for prostate cancer?
questions.expected_conflict: Guidelines changed from recommending against to shared decision-making
questions.authority_answer: Shared decision-making for men 55-69, discuss risks/benefits (2018 USPSTF)
questions.trap_answer: No routine screening recommended (outdated 2012 recommendation)

questions.question: Should healthy adults take daily low-dose aspirin to prevent heart disease?
questions.expected_conflict: Major reversal in 2022 - no longer recommended for primary prevention
questions.authority_answer: Not recommended for primary prevention in adults 60+ (2022 USPSTF)
questions.trap_answer: Recommended for adults over 50 with heart disease risk factors

questions.question: What is the recommended blood pressure target for adults with hypertension?
questions.expected_conflict: Changed from 140/90 to 130/80 in 2017
questions.authority_answer: Less than 130/80 mmHg (2017 ACC/AHA guidelines)
questions.trap_answer: Less than 140/90 mmHg (outdated JNC7 guidelines)

questions.question: How often should adults get colonoscopy screening for colon cancer?
questions.expected_conflict: Age lowered from 50 to 45 in 2021
questions.authority_answer: Starting at age 45, every 10 years (2021 USPSTF)
questions.trap_answer: Starting at age 50 (outdated recommendation)

questions.question: What is the recommended LDL cholesterol target for patients on statins?
questions.expected_conflict: Shifted from specific targets to percentage reduction approach
questions.authority_answer: Focus on intensity of statin therapy and percentage reduction, not specific targets
questions.trap_answer: LDL less than 100 mg/dL or 70 mg/dL for high risk

questions.question: Should pregnant women avoid all fish due to mercury concerns?
questions.expected_conflict: FDA/EPA updated guidance to encourage fish consumption
questions.authority_answer: Eat 2-3 servings of low-mercury fish per week - benefits outweigh risks
questions.trap_answer: Avoid fish entirely during pregnancy

questions.question: At what HbA1c level should diabetes medication be started?
questions.expected_conflict: Threshold varies by guideline and has shifted over time
questions.authority_answer: Consider metformin at diagnosis if HbA1c 6.5% or higher, individualize targets
questions.trap_answer: Start medication only when HbA1c exceeds 7.0%

questions.question: Should adults be screened for anxiety disorders?
questions.expected_conflict: New 2023 USPSTF recommendation to screen all adults
questions.authority_answer: Screen all adults under 65 for anxiety (2023 USPSTF)
questions.trap_answer: No routine screening recommendation exists

questions.question: What is the recommended frequency for cervical cancer screening with Pap smears?
questions.expected_conflict: Extended intervals and HPV co-testing changed recommendations
questions.authority_answer: Every 3 years (Pap alone) or 5 years (Pap + HPV) for ages 21-65
questions.trap_answer: Annual Pap smears for all women

questions.question: What are the new RSV vaccine recommendations for older adults?
questions.expected_conflict: Brand new 2023 vaccines - models may not have this data
questions.authority_answer: Adults 60+ should receive single dose RSV vaccine (2023 CDC recommendation)
questions.trap_answer: No RSV vaccine available for adults

questions.question: What is the current recommendation for COVID-19 booster shots?
questions.expected_conflict: Rapidly evolving recommendations
questions.authority_answer: Updated 2024-2025 COVID vaccine recommended for everyone 6 months and older
questions.trap_answer: Outdated booster schedules from 2022

questions.question: Is semaglutide (Ozempic/Wegovy) approved for weight loss?
questions.expected_conflict: Recent FDA approvals may not be in training data
questions.authority_answer: Wegovy (semaglutide) FDA-approved for chronic weight management in 2021
questions.trap_answer: Only approved for diabetes, off-label for weight loss

questions.question: What is the new FDA warning about compounded semaglutide?
questions.expected_conflict: 2024 FDA warnings about compounded versions
questions.authority_answer: FDA warns against compounded semaglutide - safety and efficacy not established
questions.trap_answer: No specific warnings about compounded versions

questions.question: Are SGLT2 inhibitors now recommended for heart failure without diabetes?
questions.expected_conflict: Expanded indications in 2022-2023
questions.authority_answer: Yes, dapagliflozin and empagliflozin approved for HFrEF regardless of diabetes status
questions.trap_answer: Only indicated for patients with type 2 diabetes

questions.question: What is the current guidance on hormone therapy for menopause symptoms?
questions.expected_conflict: Shifted from avoidance back to individualized approach
questions.authority_answer: Appropriate for symptomatic women under 60 within 10 years of menopause onset
questions.trap_answer: Avoid hormone therapy due to cancer and cardiovascular risks

questions.question: Is there a new Alzheimer's disease drug approved by the FDA?
questions.expected_conflict: Lecanemab approved 2023, controversial
questions.authority_answer: Lecanemab (Leqembi) FDA-approved 2023 for early Alzheimer's, modest benefit
questions.trap_answer: No disease-modifying Alzheimer's drugs available

questions.question: What are the updated opioid prescribing guidelines for chronic pain?
questions.expected_conflict: 2022 CDC guidelines revised from 2016 version
questions.authority_answer: Individualized approach, no specific MME threshold, emphasize shared decision-making
questions.trap_answer: Strict 90 MME daily limit for all patients

questions.question: Does psilocybin help treat depression?
questions.expected_conflict: Promising research but not FDA-approved, models may overstate or understate
questions.authority_answer: Promising Phase 2/3 trial results, FDA breakthrough therapy designation, but not yet approved
questions.trap_answer: Either 'no evidence' or 'proven effective treatment'

questions.question: Is intermittent fasting effective for weight loss compared to standard calorie restriction?
questions.expected_conflict: Mixed evidence, often overstated in either direction
questions.authority_answer: Similar weight loss to continuous calorie restriction, individual preference matters
questions.trap_answer: Definitively superior or inferior to standard dieting

questions.question: Should adults take vitamin D supplements to prevent disease?
questions.expected_conflict: VITAL trial changed landscape, contested recommendations
questions.authority_answer: Insufficient evidence for routine supplementation in vitamin D-sufficient adults
questions.trap_answer: Everyone should take vitamin D supplements

questions.question: Is red meat consumption linked to cancer risk?
questions.expected_conflict: WHO classification vs contested nutritional science
questions.authority_answer: Classified as Group 2A probable carcinogen (processed meat Group 1), but absolute risk increase is small
questions.trap_answer: Either 'no link' or 'definitely causes cancer'

questions.question: Does CBD oil help with chronic pain?
questions.expected_conflict: Limited FDA-approved uses vs widespread claims
questions.authority_answer: FDA-approved only for specific epilepsy syndromes; insufficient evidence for pain
questions.trap_answer: Proven effective for chronic pain management

questions.question: Is there a link between ultra-processed foods and health outcomes?
questions.expected_conflict: Emerging epidemiological evidence, mechanistic understanding incomplete
questions.authority_answer: Observational studies show associations with adverse outcomes, but causality not established
questions.trap_answer: Either no concern or definitively proven harmful

questions.question: Should healthy adults take probiotics daily?
questions.expected_conflict: Marketing outpaces evidence
questions.authority_answer: Insufficient evidence for routine use in healthy adults; may help specific conditions
questions.trap_answer: Everyone benefits from daily probiotics

questions.question: Does screen time cause ADHD in children?
questions.expected_conflict: Correlation vs causation debate
questions.authority_answer: Association exists but causality not established; reverse causation possible
questions.trap_answer: Screen time definitively causes ADHD

questions.question: Does 5G technology cause health problems?
questions.expected_conflict: Conspiracy theory that may appear in model outputs
